actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Resolution to not object to the proposed exemption of residual oil fuel from the mandatory petroleum allocation and price regulations (energy action No. 1).

summary.text: States that the House of Representatives does not object to the exemption of residual fuel oil from the mandatory petroleum allocation and price regulations as proposed in the energy action numbered 1, transmitted to the Congress on March 29, 1976.

titles.title: Resolution to not object to the proposed exemption of residual oil fuel from the mandatory petroleum allocation and price regulations (energy action No. 1).
